alert.note: Alert for East Wind River Mountains, South Shoshone NF; Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 21 at 3:38AM MDT until July 22 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM MDT FRIDAY... * IMPACTS: Low Humidities...Gusty Winds...and Scattered Dry Thunderstorms Friday may create erratic fire behavior and new fire starts. * AFFECTED AREA: In Central WY...Fire Weather Zones 283 and 288. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In Central WY...Fremont. In West Central WY...Sublette. * WIND: On Thursday, northwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts to 30 mph. On Friday, southwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts to 30 mph. Brief higher gusts of 40 to 50 mph are possible in thunderstorm outflows Friday afternoon and evening. * HUMIDITY: 10 to 15 percent. * TEMPERATURES: Highs 90 to 95, with 70s in the mountains.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: East Wind River Mountains, South Shoshone NF; Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin
